Compact a Delta table

Source: R/write.R
compact.Rd

Compact files in a Delta table to reduce the number of small files and improve query performance.

Usage

compact(
  table,
  ...,
  target_size = NULL,
  max_concurrent_tasks = NULL,
  min_commit_interval_ms = NULL,
  partition_filters = NULL
)

Arguments

table

A DeltaTable object.

...

Additional arguments passed to methods.

target_size

Numeric. Target size in bytes for compacted files.

max_concurrent_tasks

Integer. Maximum number of concurrent tasks.

min_commit_interval_ms

Numeric. Minimum interval between commits in milliseconds.

partition_filters

Character vector. Filters to select partitions to compact (e.g., c("date=2023-01-01")).

Value

A list with compaction metrics.

On this page
